remarks: A cancellation law for division.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
divcan8d.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcan8d.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divcan8d.a0 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
divcan8d.b0 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
divcan8d $p |- ( ph -> ( B / ( A x. B ) ) = ( 1 / A ) ) $.
